section.section:
Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this section, a public employer may not knowingly buy, furnish, or require an employee to buy or acquire for use while on duty any of the following items unless the item is manufactured in the United States:
a uniform or any other item of apparel, the selection of which is not in the employee's discretion, except for the proper size; or
safety equipment and protective accessories.

The Board shall adopt regulations defining the following terms for the purposes of this section:
"reasonably available";
"unreasonable amount"; and
"substantially less".
